name: Messages.Google - Easy Color
description: Change main BG and text box BGs with ease.
css:
@-moz-document url-prefix("https://messages.google.com/web/conversations/") {
.dark-mode [_nghost-ift-c25] {                              /*Core BG*/
    --conv-container-host-bg-color: #1a1a1a;                    /*Over all BG*/
}

.dark-mode [_nghost-ift-c31] {                              /*Message Input box*/
    --input-bg-color: #454a4d;                                  /*Text Message BG*/
    --input-bg-fade-color: #1a1a1a;                             /*Text Message behind box BG*/
}

.dark-mode [_nghost-pyr-c46] {                              /*Message Boxs*/
    --empty-bg-color: #fff;                                     /* IDK */
    --incoming-bg-color: #404040;                           /*Messager's text box color*/
    --incoming-color: #000;                                 /*Messager's text box's font color*/
    --message-border-color: #fff;                               /* IDK */
    --xms-outgoing-bg-color: #00bf00;                       /*User's text box color*/
    --xms-outgoing-color: #000;                             /*User's text box's font color*/
    --xms-outgoing-selection-color: #fff;                       /* IDK */
    --rcs-outgoing-bg-color: #00bf00;                       /*User's text box color*/
    --rcs-outgoing-color: #000;                             /*User's text box's font color*/
}
}
